document_data.name: ''Anti-Magic Shield''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Anti-Magic Shields''''', sometimes also referred to as '''''Mage-Killers''''', were large [[enchanted]] [[shield]]s often used against [[arcane]] spellcasters.
document_data.Powers: ''Anti-Magic Shields'' possessed ''+2 enchantments'' that kept their used safe from physical harm, while their powerful spell resistance kept the wielders safe from magics.
document_data.History:
Historically, these shields could be seen in the hands of the most skilled mercenaries and assassins who targeted powerful mages. ''Anti-Magic Shields'' were nuisances even to such adepts at [[the Art]] as [[Elminster]] of [[Shadowdale]] and [[Khelben Arunsun]], the Blackstaff of [[Waterdeep]]. However, many common folk said that these ''Mage-Killers'' simple "leveled the field".

In [[1373 DR]], ''Mage-Killer'' was among possessions of the [[Zhentarim]] squad stationed in [[Iyrauroth]]'s swamp in [[Thar]].
